DataElement.preferredName: Patient Clinical Trial Refusal to Participate Eligibility Criteria Confirmation Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Verification that the patient meets the eligibility requirements for declining to participate in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Clinical Trial Refusal to Participate Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._Declining to take part in activities or procedures that are available to, or requested or expected of, an individual._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Clinical Trial Refusal to Participate Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:Declining to take part in activities or procedures that are available to, or requested or expected of, an individual.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
Declining to take part in activities or procedures that are available to, or requested or expected of, an individual.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
